quotes.message: When you lose a person you love so much, surviving the loss is difficult.
quotes.name: Cristiano Ronaldo

quotes.message: I think loss of loved ones is the hardest blow in life.

Their love leaves an indelible imprint in our memories. We find comfort in knowing that our lives have been enriched by having shared their love.

quotes.message: Words seem inadequate to express the sadness we feel we for and your family. We are here to help, support, and do whatever you need done.
